name: 郭宏源
objective: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
schedule:
1. Design Concepts
2. Introduction to Logic Circuit
3. Transistor Switches, Programmable Logic Devices
4. Introduction to VHDL, Custom Chips, ASIC
5. FPGA, MOSFET Fabrication & Behavior
6. Optimized Implementation of Logic Function
7. Number Representation & Arithmetic Circuits
8. Combination-Circuit Building Blocks
9. Midterm Examination
10. Registers, Counters, and Simple Processor
11. Synchronous Sequential Circuits
12. Synthesis of VHDL Code
13. Finite State Machine, Algorithmic State Machine
14. Asynchronous Sequential Circuits
15. State Assignment
16. Digital System Design
17. Testing of Logic Circuits
18. Final Examination
scorePolicy:
平時: 40%
期中考: 30%
期末考: 30%
materials: Fundamentals of Digital Logic with VHDL Design, Stephen Brown, Mc Graw Hill
